Fair-play on both sides: or, the surest way to heaven Discovered in a dispute between a Roman-Catholick, and a Protestant. Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.
[4], 32 p.
printed for Richard Head, at the Heart and Bible in Little-Brittain, London : 1666.
Dedication signed: Sam Hieron. Reproduction of the original in the Union theological Seminary Library, New York.
